text: Investing in smart, high tech resources will only improve the long-term oversight of who and what are coming through the border.

text: We need to provide more technology to be used along the border. We know that most of the drugs streaming into our country are coming through our ports of entry. It's time that we provide those checkpoints with innovative technology to decrease illegal flows of drugs & weapons.
label: R

label: R

text: Our goal should be to improve the existing barriers, and implement new physical barriers where they are needed. https://t.co/kKIvVx6s2x

text: Where we already have walls, we've seen dramatic decreases in illegal border crossings.
